text: Miguel Ángel Asturias Rosales (October 19, 1899 - June 9, 1974) was a writer and diplomat from Guatemala. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1967 for his Banana Trilogy. He also wrote El Hombre que lo tenía todo todo todo. He was very important for literature in his country. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America == References == == Other websites == * prizes/literature/laureates/1967/asturias-bio.html Nobel org Category:1899 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Guatemalan writers Category:Guatemalan politicians
title: Miguel Ángel Asturias
